The court stated that the UAPA could not be applied due to defective sanction orders and noted the prosecution failed to prove key evidence. Families of the deceased will receive compensation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/2008-malegaon-blast-case-court-says-no-reliable-proof-to-warrant-conviction-heres-why-all-7-accused-were-let-off/articleshow/123014240.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/2008-malegaon-blast-case-court-says-no-reliable-proof-to-warrant-conviction-heres-why-all-7-accused-were-let-off/articleshow/123014240.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 13:29:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1880623" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123015068,imgsize-1880623.cms"/></item><item><title>'Dead economies' vs 'dead hand': Medvedev trades Cold War insults to Trump's remark</title><description><![CDATA[President Trump escalated tensions with India by imposing tariffs and penalty charges, dismissing their relationship with Russia. He then targeted Dmitry Medvedev, calling him a "failed former President," triggering a sharp response. Medvedev retorted that Trump's reaction proved Russia was right and alluded to the "Dead Hand" concept, a Cold War-era nuclear deterrent, in response to Trump's "dead economies" remark.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/dead-economies-vs-dead-hand-medvedev-trades-cold-war-insults-to-trumps-remark-us-russia-standoff-heats-up-online/articleshow/123021785.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/dead-economies-vs-dead-hand-medvedev-trades-cold-war-insults-to-trumps-remark-us-russia-standoff-heats-up-online/articleshow/123021785.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 18:41:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1341128" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123022163,imgsize-1341128.cms"/></item><item><title>'India set to be 3rd largest economy': Piyush Goyal after Trump's 'dead economy' jibe</title><description><![CDATA[Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal affirmed India's commitment to protecting its national interests in trade negotiations, following the US announcement of 25% tariffs. Goyal highlighted India's rapid economic growth, countering Trump's criticism by emphasizing its position as the world's fastest-growing major economy.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/india-set-to-be-third-largest-economy-piyush-goyal-responds-to-donald-trumps-dead-economy-jibe-reiterates-national-interest-important/articleshow/123017871.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/india-set-to-be-third-largest-economy-piyush-goyal-responds-to-donald-trumps-dead-economy-jibe-reiterates-national-interest-important/articleshow/123017871.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 16:18:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="60982" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123018767,imgsize-60982.cms"/></item><item><title>Maha CM Fadnavis hails Malegaon blast case verdict, says terrorism isn't saffron</title><description><![CDATA[Maharashtra's Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis and Deputy CM Eknath Shinde welcomed the acquittal of all seven accused in the 2008 Malegaon blast case, asserting it vindicates wrongly targeted individuals and removes the "false stigma" against the Hindu community. Shinde strongly criticized Congress leaders for coining the term "Hindu terrorism" to malign patriots.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/terrorism-can-never-be-saffron-maharashtra-cm-devendra-fadnavis-hails-malegaon-blast-case-verdict-eknath-shinde-says-congress-coined-term/articleshow/123016496.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/terrorism-can-never-be-saffron-maharashtra-cm-devendra-fadnavis-hails-malegaon-blast-case-verdict-eknath-shinde-says-congress-coined-term/articleshow/123016496.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 14:41:09 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="50562" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123016521,imgsize-50562.cms"/></item><item><title>Salesforce CEO rejects predictions of widespread job displacement from AI</title><description><![CDATA[Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff disputes predictions of AI-driven job losses, asserting that AI primarily enhances human capabilities, despite Salesforce's own automation initiatives. He highlights AI's accuracy limitations, emphasizing the ongoing necessity of human oversight for fact-checking and strategic decision-making. Benioff anticipates AI will fuel a surge in small business creation by democratizing access to enterprise-level tools.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/salesforce-ceo-marc-benioff-says-i-keep-asking-ceos-what-ai-are-they-using-for-these-big-layoffs-and-i-think-/articleshow/123014079.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/salesforce-ceo-marc-benioff-says-i-keep-asking-ceos-what-ai-are-they-using-for-these-big-layoffs-and-i-think-/articleshow/123014079.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 12:40:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="66660" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123014070,imgsize-66660.cms"/></item><item><title>After Dhankhar's exit, EC finalises electoral college for vice president election</title><description><![CDATA[The Election Commission has completed the electoral college list for the upcoming Vice Presidential election in 2025. This follows Jagdeep Dhankhar's resignation from the Vice President post. The list includes elected and nominated members of Rajya Sabha and elected members of Lok Sabha. The official notification for the election is expected soon.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/vice-president-election-ec-finalises-electoral-college-poll-necessitated-after-jagdeep-dhankars-resignation/articleshow/123020571.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/vice-president-election-ec-finalises-electoral-college-poll-necessitated-after-jagdeep-dhankars-resignation/articleshow/123020571.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 17:32:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1155396" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123020591,imgsize-1155396.cms"/></item><item><title>Gill becomes 4th Indian captain to lose all five tosses — Check who the others are</title><description><![CDATA[Shubman Gill faced a setback by losing his fifth consecutive toss in the ongoing Test match. He became the fourth Indian captain to achieve this unwanted record in a five-match series. This losing streak marked India's fifteenth consecutive toss loss in international cricket. Gill now shares this fate with former captains Lala Amarnath, Kapil Dev, and Virat Kohli.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/toss-trouble-shubman-gill-becomes-4th-indian-captain-to-lose-all-five-tosses-in-a-test-series-check-who-the-others-are/articleshow/123020420.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/toss-trouble-shubman-gill-becomes-4th-indian-captain-to-lose-all-five-tosses-in-a-test-series-check-who-the-others-are/articleshow/123020420.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 18:02:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="28874" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123021189,imgsize-28874.cms"/></item><item><title>'Saffron terror narrative fell flat': BJP corners Congress after Malegaon blast acquittals, demands apology</title><description><![CDATA[A special NIA court acquitted all seven accused in the 2008 Malegaon blasts case, citing lack of evidence. BJP leaders slammed the Congress for fabricating the "Hindu terror" narrative, demanding an apology. Owaisi questioned the probe, while the Congress defended its record, asserting that terror has no religion. Victims' lawyer plans to challenge the acquittal in higher court.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/saffron-terror-narrative-falls-flat-bjp-corners-congress-after-malegaon-blast-acquittals-demands-apology/articleshow/123020458.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/saffron-terror-narrative-falls-flat-bjp-corners-congress-after-malegaon-blast-acquittals-demands-apology/articleshow/123020458.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 17:37:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="108638" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123020812,imgsize-108638.cms"/></item><item><title>Microsoft earnings call: Revenue crosses ....; Here's how Microsoft performed in FY 2025</title><description><![CDATA[Microsoft's fiscal fourth-quarter results exceeded expectations, reporting significant revenue and net income growth, fueled by a surge in demand for AI services. Azure's cloud platform achieved a major milestone, surpassing $75 billion in annual revenue with substantial growth. The company plans a record-breaking $30 billion capital expenditure, positioning itself to compete in the AI infrastructure race.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsoft-revenue-crosses-76-billion-in-q4-azure-beats-expectations-windows-grows-and-ai-tools-now-has-100-million-users-key-highlights-from-how-microsoft-performed-in-fy-2025/articleshow/123019872.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsoft-revenue-crosses-76-billion-in-q4-azure-beats-expectations-windows-grows-and-ai-tools-now-has-100-million-users-key-highlights-from-how-microsoft-performed-in-fy-2025/articleshow/123019872.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 17:02:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="92578" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123019832,imgsize-92578.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: Captain Shubman Gill breaks 47-year-old record! Surpasses Sunil Gavaskar to become ...</title><description><![CDATA[Shubman Gill has surpassed Sunil Gavaskar's 47-year-old record for the most runs by an Indian captain in a Test series, amassing 737* runs against England. His impressive performance includes four centuries, with a high score of 269. Despite India trailing 2-1 in the series, Gill's leadership and batting prowess have been a standout, marking a new chapter in Indian cricket.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-captain-shubman-gill-breaks-47-year-old-record-surpasses-sunil-gavaskar-to-become-/articleshow/123020645.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-captain-shubman-gill-breaks-47-year-old-record-surpasses-sunil-gavaskar-to-become-/articleshow/123020645.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 17:43:27 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="107420" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123020607,imgsize-107420.cms"/></item><item><title>'Refugees or illegal entrants?' SC questions Rohingyas' status in India</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court is set to determine the status of Rohingyas in India, prioritizing whether they are refugees or illegal immigrants. This decision will dictate their rights and protections, as well as the justification for potential deportation by the government.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/refugees-or-illegal-entrants-sc-questions-rohingyas-status-in-india-outlines-other-issues-raised-in-pleas/articleshow/123019699.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/refugees-or-illegal-entrants-sc-questions-rohingyas-status-in-india-outlines-other-issues-raised-in-pleas/articleshow/123019699.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 17:32:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="944527" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123019658,imgsize-944527.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG 5th Test: Did Kumar Dharmasena save a DRS for England?</title><description><![CDATA[During the 5th Test between India and England, umpire Kumar Dharmasena's gesture indicating an inside edge off Sai Sudharsan's bat sparked social media buzz. Replays confirmed the edge, saving Sudharsan from an LBW. India faced early setbacks, losing both openers cheaply, leaving Sudharsan to stabilize the innings in challenging conditions after losing the toss.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-did-kumar-dharmasena-save-a-drs-for-england-viral-moment-sparks-controversy/articleshow/123019989.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-5th-test-did-kumar-dharmasena-save-a-drs-for-england-viral-moment-sparks-controversy/articleshow/123019989.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 17:14:10 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="717872" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123020023,imgsize-717872.cms"/></item><item><title>Microsoft lists 40 jobs that AI may replace 'fastest' and 40 it may not be able to</title><description><![CDATA[Microsoft Research has identified 40 jobs potentially impacted by AI, particularly those involving language and content creation, while highlighting the resilience of hands-on, physical roles. The study, analyzing interactions with Microsoft Bing Copilot, suggests AI will augment productivity rather than replace workers entirely. Human judgment and creativity remain crucial, even in sectors heavily influenced by AI advancements.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsoft-research-lists-40-jobs-that-ai-may-replace-fastest-and-40-it-may-not-be-able-to/articleshow/123020092.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsoft-research-lists-40-jobs-that-ai-may-replace-fastest-and-40-it-may-not-be-able-to/articleshow/123020092.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 17:10:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23572" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123020075,imgsize-23572.cms"/></item><item><title>Tool that can remove cancer-causing forever chemicals from water in minutes</title><description><![CDATA[Scientists have engineered a device that eliminates over 99% of carcinogenic PFAS from drinking water within five minutes. This innovative tool, featuring a metal-organic framework (MOF), not only purifies water but also glows upon detecting contamination, enabling real-time monitoring. The reusable filter maintains high efficiency even after multiple uses, offering a sustainable solution to combat widespread PFAS pollution affecting millions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/tool-that-can-remove-cancer-causing-forever-chemicals-from-water-in-minutes-developed-by-scientists/articleshow/123021776.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/tool-that-can-remove-cancer-causing-forever-chemicals-from-water-in-minutes-developed-by-scientists/articleshow/123021776.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 18:25:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44528" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123021784,imgsize-44528.cms"/></item><item><title>‘No longer with NDA’: O Panneerselvam-led AIADMK faction ends ties with BJP</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/no-longer-with-nda-former-tamil-nadu-chief-minister-o-panneerselvam-led-aiadmk-faction-ends-ties-with-bjp/articleshow/123016813.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/no-longer-with-nda-former-tamil-nadu-chief-minister-o-panneerselvam-led-aiadmk-faction-ends-ties-with-bjp/articleshow/123016813.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 14:56:08 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44316" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123016925,imgsize-44316.cms"/></item><item><title>Chhattisgarh 'human trafficking' victim accuses Bajrang Dal of 'coercion'</title><description><![CDATA[A woman in Chhattisgarh, allegedly trafficked and coerced into conversion, accuses Bajrang Dal activists of forcing her to give a false statement and claims police mishandled her statement. She asserts she willingly traveled with the nuns for work, while her parents vouch for their innocence. Bajrang Dal denies the allegations, stating CCTV footage will reveal the truth.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/forced-me-to-give-false-statement-chhattisgarh-human-trafficking-victim-accuses-bajrang-dal-of-coercion-backs-arrested-kerala-nuns/articleshow/123018346.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/forced-me-to-give-false-statement-chhattisgarh-human-trafficking-victim-accuses-bajrang-dal-of-coercion-backs-arrested-kerala-nuns/articleshow/123018346.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 16:29:59 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="39770" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123019014,imgsize-39770.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: India field different XI in every match; three remain unused</title><description><![CDATA[India's cricket team, led by Shubman Gill, faced constant changes in their playing XI throughout the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy series against England. Despite frequent reshuffling based on conditions and workload, some players like Kuldeep Yadav, Arshdeep Singh, and Abhimanyu Easwaran didn't get a chance to play.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-india-field-different-xi-in-every-match-of-the-series-three-players-remain-unused/articleshow/123019646.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-india-field-different-xi-in-every-match-of-the-series-three-players-remain-unused/articleshow/123019646.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 16:58:10 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="131744" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123019716,imgsize-131744.cms"/></item><item><title>Gabrielle Union melts hearts with video recapping daughter Kaavia’s growing years</title><description><![CDATA[Gabrielle Union shared a video of her daughter Kaavia's growing years. Dwyane Wade also commented on the post. The video received love from fans and family. Kaavia is the inspiration for Gabrielle Union's book, Shady Baby. The book became a New York Times bestseller. Gabrielle and Dwyane often talk about their parenting style. They inspire others on various platforms.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/dwyane-wades-wife-gabrielle-union-melts-hearts-with-video-recapping-their-daughter-kaavias-growing-years/articleshow/123016677.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/dwyane-wades-wife-gabrielle-union-melts-hearts-with-video-recapping-their-daughter-kaavias-growing-years/articleshow/123016677.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 16:30:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1819815" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123020288,imgsize-1819815.cms"/></item><item><title>'Busy day' at White House: 25% tariff on India, 'dead economies' jibe, deal with Pak & more</title><description><![CDATA[President Trump unveiled a series of trade actions, imposing a 25% tariff and penalties on Indian goods due to trade imbalances and ties with Russia. Simultaneously, he offered to collaborate with Pakistan on oil development, hinting at potential future exports to India. Trump also announced trade measures against Brazil and South Korea, while criticizing Canada's stance on Palestinian statehood.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/busy-day-at-white-house-25-tariff-on-india-dead-economies-jibe-trade-deal-with-pakistan-more-key-points/articleshow/123011589.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/busy-day-at-white-house-25-tariff-on-india-dead-economies-jibe-trade-deal-with-pakistan-more-key-points/articleshow/123011589.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 11:04:27 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="960207" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123011903,imgsize-960207.cms"/></item><item><title>961 days of wait: Easwaran warms the bench as others race ahead of him</title><description><![CDATA[Abhimanyu Easwaran's wait for his Test debut extends beyond 961 days, despite multiple call-ups and team tours. While 15 other players have debuted since his initial selection, Easwaran remains a reserve, witnessing leadership changes and younger players being preferred. His patience is being tested, having been part of major Test series without getting a chance to play.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/961-days-of-wait-abhimanyu-easwaran-warms-the-bench-as-others-race-ahead-of-him/articleshow/123018415.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/961-days-of-wait-abhimanyu-easwaran-warms-the-bench-as-others-race-ahead-of-him/articleshow/123018415.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 16:10:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="28360" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123018535,imgsize-28360.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump’s 25% tariff on India: Oppn fires at PM Modi; here's who said what</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump's tariff announcement triggered reactions from Indian opposition leaders. Rahul Gandhi criticized the Modi government's economic policies. Asaduddin Owaisi condemned Trump's actions. Mallikarjun Kharge questioned Modi's silence. Pawan Khera mocked the foreign policy. Shashi Tharoor expressed concerns about trade relations. Priyanka Gandhi Vadra questioned Modi's diplomatic efforts. Akhilesh Yadav worried about the economy and employment.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/trumps-25-tariff-on-india-opposition-fires-at-pm-modi-govt-heres-who-said-what/articleshow/123014021.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/trumps-25-tariff-on-india-opposition-fires-at-pm-modi-govt-heres-who-said-what/articleshow/123014021.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 15:42:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="42586" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123016923,imgsize-42586.cms"/></item><item><title>ChatGPT launches Study Mode for students: Free to use in India; step-by-step guide</title><description><![CDATA[ChatGPT introduces 'Study Mode' in India. This new feature helps students with studies and exam preparation. It is available for free. Students can now get simplified explanations. They can ask subject-specific questions. The AI tool also provides quizzes. This makes learning more accessible. It is designed to improve efficiency. This is a major educational upgrade for Indian students.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/chatgpt-launches-study-mode-for-students-available-in-india-for-free-how-to-use-this-latest-feature/articleshow/123016235.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/chatgpt-launches-study-mode-for-students-available-in-india-for-free-how-to-use-this-latest-feature/articleshow/123016235.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 14:48:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="32012" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123016599,imgsize-32012.cms"/></item><item><title>'We may have to walk away': Shashi Tharoor on 'unreasonable' demands by US</title><description><![CDATA[Shashi Tharoor voiced serious concerns over Trump's proposed tariffs on India, warning of potential damage to trade relations. Tharoor emphasized India's strong domestic market and its ability to withstand potential trade disruptions, advocating for strong support for negotiators.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/we-may-have-to-walk-away-shashi-tharoor-on-unreasonable-demands-by-us-says-india-is-not-out-of-options/articleshow/123017428.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/we-may-have-to-walk-away-shashi-tharoor-on-unreasonable-demands-by-us-says-india-is-not-out-of-options/articleshow/123017428.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 15:24:47 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1121566" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123017607,imgsize-1121566.cms"/></item><item><title>Dharmasthala horror: Human bones recovered from mass burial site</title><description><![CDATA[The Special Investigation Team (SIT) has discovered partial skeletal remains at site number 6 during the Dharmasthala mass burial case investigation. The remains, found at a depth of four feet, are being sent for forensic analysis.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mangaluru/dharmasthala-horror-human-bones-recovered-from-mass-burial-site-sit-finds-skeleton-remains-at-4-foot-depth/articleshow/123016330.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mangaluru/dharmasthala-horror-human-bones-recovered-from-mass-burial-site-sit-finds-skeleton-remains-at-4-foot-depth/articleshow/123016330.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 14:29:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>VINOBHA KT</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="114410" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123016339,imgsize-114410.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: Can Gill’s men defy history & avoid series defeat after five toss losses?</title><description><![CDATA[At The Oval, England's Ollie Pope won the toss and chose to bowl against India, extending India's toss-loss streak to 15 in international cricket. Despite this, India aim to defy history after saving the fourth Test.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-india-lose-toss-again-can-shubman-gills-men-defy-history-and-avoid-series-defeat-after-five-toss-losses/articleshow/123018363.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-india-lose-toss-again-can-shubman-gills-men-defy-history-and-avoid-series-defeat-after-five-toss-losses/articleshow/123018363.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 16:02:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="29238" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123018443,imgsize-29238.cms"/></item><item><title>'No proof that Pragya Thakur owned the bike': All Malegaon bomb blast accused acquitted</title><description><![CDATA[A special NIA court in Mumbai acquitted all seven accused in the 2008 Malegaon blast case, including Pragya Singh Thakur and Lt. Col. Shrikant Prasad Purohit, after a 17-year trial. The court cited a lack of concrete evidence, emphasizing that suspicion alone is insufficient for conviction.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/no-evidence-to-prove-that-pragya-thakur-owned-motorcycle-all-malegaon-bomb-blast-accused-acquitted-heres-what-special-nia-court-observed/articleshow/123012638.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/no-evidence-to-prove-that-pragya-thakur-owned-motorcycle-all-malegaon-bomb-blast-accused-acquitted-heres-what-special-nia-court-observed/articleshow/123012638.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 11:52:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>REBECCA SAMERVEL</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="30294" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123014296,imgsize-30294.cms"/></item><item><title>'Stated a fact': Rahul Gandhi echoes Trump’s ‘dead economy’ remark on India</title><description><![CDATA[Rahul Gandhi, echoing Donald Trump's assessment, declared the Indian economy "dead," citing the Modi administration's policies. Trump criticized India's high tariffs and suggested India and Russia could face economic downturns together.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/stated-a-fact-rahul-gandhi-echoes-trumps-dead-economy-remark-on-india-takes-aim-at-pm-modi/articleshow/123015588.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/stated-a-fact-rahul-gandhi-echoes-trumps-dead-economy-remark-on-india-takes-aim-at-pm-modi/articleshow/123015588.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 13:54:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="807781" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123015572,imgsize-807781.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Karnataka railway clerk on phone ignores queue of passengers</title><description><![CDATA[A video from Yadgir railway station went viral showing a ticket clerk in Karnataka neglecting a long queue of passengers while engrossed in a phone call. Disciplinary proceedings have been initiated following the social media backlash and commuter complaints about the significant delays.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/watch-viral-video-of-karnataka-railway-clerk-on-phone-ignoring-passengers-sparks-outrage-official-dismissed-after-backlash/articleshow/123014409.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/watch-viral-video-of-karnataka-railway-clerk-on-phone-ignoring-passengers-sparks-outrage-official-dismissed-after-backlash/articleshow/123014409.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 13:01:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="805482" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123014511,imgsize-805482.cms"/></item><item><title>'Bad handwriting': Mumbai tuition teacher uses candle to brand 8-year-old's palm</title><description><![CDATA[In Mumbai, a tuition teacher has been booked for allegedly branding an eight-year-old student's palms with a burning candle as punishment for poor handwriting. Police have registered a case against the teacher under the Juvenile Justice Act and Bhartiya Nyaya Sanhita.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/tuition-teacher-uses-candle-to-brand-childs-palm-fir-filed/articleshow/123003526.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/tuition-teacher-uses-candle-to-brand-childs-palm-fir-filed/articleshow/123003526.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 23:13:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="293156" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123014729,imgsize-293156.cms"/></item><item><title>Whale calf hit by speedboat: Drone captures viral moment</title><description><![CDATA[A southern right whale calf was struck by a boat off NSW, weeks after its mother was injured similarly. These endangered whales are vulnerable due to their shallow water habits and lack of dorsal fins.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/whale-calf-hit-by-speedboat-drone-captures-viral-moment-see-video/articleshow/123014543.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/whale-calf-hit-by-speedboat-drone-captures-viral-moment-see-video/articleshow/123014543.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 13:13:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="657847" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123014728,imgsize-657847.cms"/></item><item><title>'Bhagwa ki vijay hui hai': Pragya Thakur breaks down after acquittal</title><description><![CDATA[Pragya Singh Thakur, after being acquitted in the 2008 Malegaon blasts case, declared it a victory for 'Bhagwa,' alleging a conspiracy to defame it. Revaluation and retotaling options are available.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/tamil-nadu-sslc-hse-1-supplementary-results-2025-declared-check-direct-link-and-steps-to-download-scorecards-here/articleshow/123016478.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/tamil-nadu-sslc-hse-1-supplementary-results-2025-declared-check-direct-link-and-steps-to-download-scorecards-here/articleshow/123016478.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 14:47:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="286777" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123016717,imgsize-286777.cms"/></item><item><title>Going to Mussoorie? Hotels and guesthouses will collect guest data to help manage overcrowding and traffic congestion. This action follows a National Green Tribunal directive to monitor tourist numbers and ensure the hill station's carrying capacity is not exceeded.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/tourist-registration-now-mandatory-for-mussoorie-visitors/articleshow/123003719.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/tourist-registration-now-mandatory-for-mussoorie-visitors/articleshow/123003719.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 30 Jul 2025 23:25:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ANMOL JAIN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="71934" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123011325,imgsize-71934.cms"/></item><item><title>Rs 21k a month for nursery: Are Hyderabad schools now more expensive than Dubai?</title><description><![CDATA[A viral post exposing a Hyderabad private school’s ₹2.51 lakh annual nursery fee has sparked nationwide outrage, raising alarms over the rising cost of early education. Rahul's strong relationship with KKR's assistant coach Abhishek Nayar is a key factor. However, the trade might be difficult as KKR lacks suitable players to offer Delhi Capitals in return, after a disappointing 2025 season.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/ipl-kkr-want-kl-rahul-in-blockbuster-trade-may-make-him-captain/articleshow/123015677.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/ipl-kkr-want-kl-rahul-in-blockbuster-trade-may-make-him-captain/articleshow/123015677.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 13:59:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GAURAV GUPTA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="143700" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123015686,imgsize-143700.cms"/></item><item><title>UP Sawan Mela scare: Biker crashes mid-stunt in ‘Maut ka Kuan’</title><description><![CDATA[Panic at the Sawan fair in Maharajganj when a motorcycle stunt went awry at the 'Well of Death,' causing the rider to fall. Authorities shut down the unauthorized attraction and launched an inquiry into safety violations at the rural fair.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/up-sawan-mela-scare-biker-crashes-mid-stunt-in-maut-ka-kuan-riderless-bike-keeps-circling-arena/articleshow/123012344.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/up-sawan-mela-scare-biker-crashes-mid-stunt-in-maut-ka-kuan-riderless-bike-keeps-circling-arena/articleshow/123012344.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 12:22:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PATHIKRIT CHAKRABORTY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1228336" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123013639,imgsize-1228336.cms"/></item><item><title>Hilarious! Kuldeep Yadav also made a brief appearance. The vlog captured their fun outing and camaraderie.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-hilarious-arshdeep-singh-dhruv-jurel-react-to-shirt-worth-rs-3-lakh-in-england-market/articleshow/123014419.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-hilarious-arshdeep-singh-dhruv-jurel-react-to-shirt-worth-rs-3-lakh-in-england-market/articleshow/123014419.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 13:39:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="51634" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123015275,imgsize-51634.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump tariffs: Why India’s stock market has not crashed - explained</title><description><![CDATA[The US imposed steep 25% tariffs on Indian imports, the highest in Asia, sparking market volatility. While initial concerns arose, analysts predict potential tariff reductions through negotiations, with a US trade delegation expected to visit India. Experts suggest a final deal with lower tariffs is likely, presenting buying opportunities in domestic-focused sectors.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trump-tariffs-why-indias-stock-market-has-not-crashed-is-resilient-even-after-25-tariff-announcement-explained/articleshow/123014451.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trump-tariffs-why-indias-stock-market-has-not-crashed-is-resilient-even-after-25-tariff-announcement-explained/articleshow/123014451.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 13:20:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="106692" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123014804,imgsize-106692.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>

      <title><![CDATA[Tata Capital targets $20 billion valuation in upcoming IPO]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/tata-capital-ipo-valuation-raised-drhp-filing-19642326.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Sources say the company is likely to file its updated Draft Red Herring Prospectus (DRHP) as early as tomorrow or by the end of this week. Tata Capital plans to raise around $2 billion through the IPO, which is expected to launch in the first half of September this year. The IPO is being driven by a regulatory mandate. In September 2022, the Reserve Bank of India classified Tata Capital as an upper-layer systemically important NBFC, requiring it to go public within three years. That deadline expires this September.]]></description>
